response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $800,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. If you decide to purchase now, you can secure this remarkable item at a special introductory price of $750,000. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as it represents a significant savings of $50,000 compared to the standard price. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to enhance your experience with our product.", "product_price": 750000}
